macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: Intel Launches 'Panther Lake' Core Ultra 300 Chips at CES 2026
items.summary: Intel officially launched its Core Ultra 300 chips, built on 18A (2nm) process, promising significant performance gains for running large AI models directly on laptops. This marks a push toward on-device AI processing highlighted at CES 2026.

items.title: Nvidia Highlights 'Blackwell Ultra' and DRIVE Thor for Physical AI at CES
items.summary: Nvidia's CES 2026 keynote emphasized 'Blackwell Ultra' and DRIVE Thor AI platform for next-generation autonomous vehicles, advancing physical AI applications. The event showcases AI integration in robots, chips, and vehicles by major firms like Nvidia, Intel, Samsung, and LG.

items.title: AMD Showcases Ryzen AI 10000 Processors at CES 2026
items.summary: AMD unveiled Ryzen AI 10000 processors at CES 2026, optimized for AI-driven tasks like generative video editing and real-time translation with high energy efficiency. This supports the trend of on-device AI and agentic systems.

items.title: CES 2026 Spotlights Agentic AI and Physical Robotics
items.summary: CES 2026 highlights a shift to agentic AI systems that act independently, with robotics, on-device processing, and ambient wearables as key themes. Companies are demonstrating commercially viable AI robots and cross-platform standards like Matter 2.0.

items.title: Scientists Propose 'Periodic Table' Mathematical Framework for AI
items.summary: Researchers developed a unifying mathematical framework, likened to a periodic table, explaining why many successful multimodal AI systems function effectively. This breakthrough aids in understanding and advancing multimodal AI.

items.title: Generative AI and Quantum Computing Trends Surge in 2026
items.summary: Analysis of 700 recent articles identifies generative AI and quantum computing as dominant trends reshaping industries like healthcare and entertainment. Trends were derived using TF-IDF, NMF, and K-Means on news data.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: Upcoming Nintendo Switch Games for January 2026 Announced
items.summary: A new video highlights several Nintendo Switch titles launching in January 2026, including Fairy Tail: Dungeons, The Legend of Heroes: Trails beyond the Horizon, Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time Remake, and Cult of the Lamb: Woolhaven. These releases feature a mix of major franchises, remakes, and indie games shaping early 2026 gaming.

items.title: Fire Emblem Heroes January 2026 New Trailer Revealed
items.summary: A new trailer for Fire Emblem Heroes has been released for January 2026, sparking discussions on GameFAQs message boards about upcoming content for the mobile game.

items.title: Wingspan Expansion and Sanibel Set for January 2026 Release
items.summary: Board game developer Elizabeth Hargrave announces a new Wingspan expansion and the Sanibel game arriving this month, providing fresh content for tabletop gaming enthusiasts.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.

items.title: Intel Launches Core Ultra Series 3 (Panther Lake) Processors
items.summary: Intel unveiled its Core Ultra Series 3 processors built on the advanced 18A manufacturing process, targeting premium AI PCs with 50%+ performance gains, integrated NPUs, and improved efficiency.

items.title: Samsung Unveils AI-Enhanced Consumer Electronics Lineup
items.summary: Samsung's January 4 event previewed expanded Micro LED RGB TVs up to 115 inches, 6K Odyssey gaming monitors with glasses-free 3D technology, and refreshed Bespoke AI appliances with smart home integration.

items.title: Neuralink Targets High-Volume Brain Implant Production in 2026
items.summary: Elon Musk announced Neuralink will ramp to high-volume brain implant production with fully automated surgical procedures, following successful trials enabling paralyzed patients to control computers through thought.

items.title: CES 2026 Media Day Begins with Major Keynotes
items.summary: CES 2026 media day kicks off with keynotes on January 5, with the full show opening January 6 in Las Vegas, featuring announcements across TVs, wearables, smart home devices, EVs, and computing.
